Package jwrc.menus

Class BrokeMenu

java.lang.Object
jwrc.menus.BrokeMenu
All Implemented Interfaces:
Menuable
public class BrokeMenu
extends java.lang.Object
implements Menuable
Menu presented to the player when they have gone broke to the bank and must liquidate assets

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static void options​(Player player, java.util.ArrayList<Player> players, int cost)
    Menu offering selling/mortgaging options to a player who does not have sufficient money to proceed Should only access this menu through Bank transaction failure as per specification.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • options

      public static void options​(Player player, java.util.ArrayList<Player> players, int cost)
      Menu offering selling/mortgaging options to a player who does not have sufficient money to proceed Should only access this menu through Bank transaction failure as per specification.
      Parameters:
      player - the player who needs to acquire money
      players - the players remaining in the game
      cost - the cost of the transaction in question
